short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to launch URLs with single click including POST,PATCH,DELETE types as well

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows users to open HTTP POST links with a single click. Currently, only GET and POST methods are supported, with plans to include other methods in future updates.
